blockquote.quote: When a Jam begins, the Jammers must be touching on or behind the Jammer Line. All Blockers must be behind the Pivot Line, ahead of the Jammer Line, and all Non-Pivot Blockers must not be touching the Pivot Line. If either Pivot lines up touching the Pivot Line at the Jam’s start, all Non-Pivot Blockers must be behind that Pivot’s hips.
blockquote.author: —Origin: Section 2.2

sections.title: Scenario C2.2.A
sections.situation: As the Jam-Starting Whistle sounds, Red Jammer’s left skate has rolled forward, past the Jammer Line.
